title: Mark V Pressure Suit (developmental), "Mark V – Modified Suit", 1968
medium: Nylon, rubber/neoprene, brass, aluminum, neoprene-coated nylon, steel, PVC, cotton-canvas, leather
markings:
interior label:
MARK V TORSO ASSEMBLY
THE B.F. GOODRICH CO.

s/n151400
creditline: Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum, Transferred from NASA, 1980-0041-000
description: Olive green pressure suit with one developmental arm, with large convoluted shoulder and elbow hinges; diagonal zipper, two pressure gauges and one opening on torso, one pressure gauge on left arm, one on left leg.

participants.person_name: National Air & Space Museum, Smithsonian Institution
